mapper.insert: insert into Product (loginId, productTitle, productContent, saleStatus, productStatus, hidden, productLookupCount, productLikeCount, categoryIdx, productPhotos) values (#{loginId},#{productTitle},#{productContent},#{saleStatus},#{productStatus}, #{hidden},#{productLookupCount},#{productLikeCount},#{categoryIdx},#{productPhotos})
mapper.update: update Product set restep=restep+1 where reg=#{reg} and restep>#{restep}
mapper.select: select productPhotos from Product where productIdx=#{productIdx}
mapper.update: update Product set productLookupCount=productLookupCount+1 where productIdx=#{productIdx}
mapper.select: select * from Product where categoryIdx=#{categoryIdx} order by reg desc, restep asc limit #{start}, #{perpage}
select categoryName from Category where categoryIdx=#{categoryIdx}
